title: Miranda Kerr and Evan Spiegel welcome baby boy Myles: 'We are overjoyed'
text:
CLOSE

Evan Spiegel and Miranda Kerr in 2016. (Photo: Tommaso Boddi/Getty Images for Baby2Baby)

Miranda Kerr and Evan Spiegel have welcomed a new baby.

The model and founder of Kora Organics announced the arrival of their new bundle of joy on Instagram Tuesday.

"We are overjoyed at the arrival of Myles and so appreciate everyone's kind words and wishes during this special time," Kerr, 36, captioned a photo of peach fabric embroidered with her newest's name. "We couldn't be more excited to welcome our beautiful son into our family."

Kerr's rep confirmed to USA TODAY in March that the couple, who wed in 2017, were expecting their second baby.

Justin Timberlake says family life with Jessica Biel and son is like a 'baptism'

'Boy Meets World' star Danielle Fishel says 'none of us escape mom-guilt' in emotional essay

Kerr and the Snapchat CEO, 29, announced the arrival of son Hart in May 2018. Kerr also has 8-year-old son Flynn from her previous relationship with Orlando Bloom.

USA TODAY has reached out to reps for Kerr and Spiegel for comment.

Contributing: Andrea Mandell

Orlando Bloom finds joy with fiancee Katy Perry (and the end of her feud with Taylor Swift)

description: Miranda Kerr and Evan Spiegel have welcomed a new baby, and will likely have Myles to go before they sleep.
